items.title: Jumper Wire Set
items.subtitle: 140 pcs.

seo.description: Set of 140 jumper wires for breadboard prototyping
seo.keywords: arduino, jumpers, wires, jumper wires, prototyping

items.content: The set includes 140 jumper wires (14 types) of various colors: red, green, yellow, orange, gray, white, blue) and sizes: 2, 5, 7, 10, 12, 15, 17, 20, 22, 25, 50, 75, 100, 125mm.

items.title: THAT1512
items.subtitle: Audio preamplifier

seo.description: The THAT1512 analog audio preamp delivers pristine sound quality with ultra-low noise and precision control, perfect for studio recording and live sound applications
seo.keywords: THAT1512, preamplifier, audio, ultra-low noise, precision, sound

items.content: Introducing the THAT1512, an exceptional analog audio preamplifier integrated circuit meticulously engineered by THAT Corporation. Designed to meet the rigorous demands of professional audio applications, the THAT1512 boasts unparalleled performance and precision.
peculiarities: Low Noise: Experience pristine audio signals with minimal interference, thanks to the THAT1512's ultra-low noise design, ensuring crystal-clear audio reproduction.
High Dynamic Range: Enjoy a wide dynamic range that faithfully captures the full spectrum of audio signals, from subtle nuances to powerful peaks, without sacrificing quality.
Precision Gain Control: Fine-tune your audio levels with precision using the integrated gain control feature, allowing for meticulous adjustment to suit your specific application requirements.
Wide Bandwidth: With its broad bandwidth response, the THAT1512 delivers consistent fidelity across the entire audio frequency range, ensuring accurate reproduction of sound.

Reliable Performance: Built to withstand the demands of professional audio environments, the THAT1512 offers robust construction and dependable performance, ensuring consistent operation under challenging conditions.

Seamless Integration: Designed for easy integration into a variety of audio systems, the THAT1512 simplifies the development process and streamlines implementation, making it an ideal choice for both new and existing setups.

items.title: Hi-Link A0515S-2WR3
items.subtitle: DC-DC 5V to ±15V, 2W

seo.description: Discover the Hi-Link A0515S-2WR3: compact, efficient, and reliable DC/DC power supply modules designed for on-board systems. With constant voltage output, input isolation, and dual outputs, these modules cater to diverse applications, ensuring stable power delivery in automotive, industrial, and embedded systems

items.content:
The Hi-Link AxxxxS-2WR3 series represents a compact and highly efficient solution for micro power applications, delivering constant voltage with input isolation and unregulated dual output DC/DC power supply modules.

Designed by Hi-Link, these modules cater to the specific requirements of on-board power supply systems, offering reliability and versatility. With a focus on small size and high efficiency, they are ideal for applications demanding isolated voltage outputs from the input power source.

Overload Protection

Under normal operating conditions, the output circuit of this product does not provide overload protection. Prolonged overload conditions will trigger over-temperature protection, leading to output shutdown.

Output Short-Circuit Protection

The product provides sustainable short-circuit protection with automatic recovery.

Caution Regarding External Capacitors

The capacitance value of externally connected capacitors should not be too large, as it may lead to over-current or poor startup performance during module initialization.
items.warningContent:
It is advisable to avoid operating the module under no-load conditions. If the actual power consumption of the load is less than 10% of the module's rated output power, or if there is a no-load condition, it is recommended to externally connect a dummy load (resistor) at the output. The value of the dummy load (resistor) can be calculated as 5-10% of the module's rated power, with the resistance value equal to R = Uout / (W * 10%).

So, you would need a resistor with a value of approximately 112.5 ohms. Since standard resistor values come in discrete steps, you would typically choose the nearest standard resistor value, such as 110 ohms or 120 ohms, depending on availability.

If the product operates below the minimum required load, the performance of the product may not meet all the performance indicators specified in the datasheet.

items.title: WeAct USB Logic Analyzer
items.subtitle: 24MHz 8-channels

seo.description: WeAct LogicAnalyzerV1 offers powerful logic analysis capabilities with its Cypress/Corebai USB controller. Capture data from 8 channels simultaneously at a maximum sampling rate of 24MHz, supporting logic levels up to 5.5V. Compatible with sigrok-PulseView software for open-source protocol analysis on Linux, Windows, and Mac OS X
seo.keywords: logic analyzer, WeAct, cypress, corebai, 8-channels, 24MHz, logic level analysis, protocol analysis

items.content:
WeAct Logic Analyzer V1 is a powerful logic analyzer built around the Cypress/Corebai USB controller. With the capability to simultaneously capture 8-channels of data. Each channel boasts a maximum sampling rate of 24MHz, accommodating rapid data acquisition. Supporting logic levels of up to 5.5V, it ensures compatibility with a wide range of devices.

The software, powered by sigrok-PulseView, is open-source and compatible with Linux, Windows, Mac OS X, and other platforms, providing flexibility for users across different operating systems. With support for over 100 protocol analyses and the ability to customize protocols, it empowers users to delve into intricate data analysis tailored to their specific needs.

items.title: Development Board Kit CH32V003
items.subtitle: 32-bit RISC-V

seo.description: Explore the CH32V003 Evaluation Development Board Kit, featuring the CH32V003F4P6 board, WCH-LinkE interface, and five CH32V003F4P6 chips in TSSOP-20 packaging. Ideal for prototyping and testing, this kit offers a comprehensive platform for evaluating the capabilities of the CH32V003 microcontroller

items.content:
The Evaluation Development Board Kit CH32V003 includes essential components for exploring the capabilities of the CH32V003 microcontroller. This comprehensive kit comprises the 1x CH32V003F4P6 board, the 1x WCH-LinkE interface, and 5x CH32V003F4P6 chips in TSSOP-20 packaging.

The CH32V003F4P6 board serves as the primary platform for prototyping and testing various applications. It provides ample connectivity options and interfaces, enabling users to interface with peripherals and sensors seamlessly. With its compact design and robust construction, the board facilitates rapid development and evaluation of embedded systems.

The WCH-LinkE interface module allows for easy communication between the CH32V003F4P6 board and a computer. Utilizing this interface, developers can upload firmware, debug code, and monitor the system's performance conveniently.

Additionally, the kit includes five CH32V003F4P6 chips in TSSOP-20 packaging. These microcontrollers feature advanced capabilities, including high-speed processing, versatile I/O options, and low-power operation. With multiple chips included in the kit, developers have the flexibility to experiment with different configurations and applications.

items.title: Microphone Preamplifier
items.subtitle: Based on THAT1512

seo.description: Enhance your audio quality with our mic preamp, featuring the powerful THAT1512 analog preamplifier. Ideal for studio and live sound applications
seo.keywords: THAT1512, NMA0515SC, pcb, audio, preamplifier, sound, ultra-low noise

items.content: Introducing microphone preamplifier PCB based on THAT1512, the foundation for professional-grade audio recording and amplification. Engineered with precision and reliability in mind, this PCB empowers audio enthusiasts and professionals alike to build their own high-quality mic preamp systems.
peculiarities: Compatible with THAT1512 analog preamplifier chip
Ideal for studio, live sound, and home audio applications
